Html:
This is great !!

Is there an event that traps a PIN that was clicked ? maybe it could return a GUID that is supplied when the pin is added. Also the facility
to added text to be displayed in a popup baloon on the selected PIN.

2nd point. If i wanted to loop around the UK and create a cache'd storage of the map, would this be possible ?

Thanks,
Paul

Tooltips are just added, i'll soon make click events to markers. About looping around, you need to do it manualy, but its quite easy to make this function automatic. I'll plan to make it and additional export/import function for cache.

Ok thanks.

Can you also distribute the .DLL as i am using VB and have converted the source code into VB , but instead of doing that for each release, ill use your .DLL

Thanks,
few hours later i'll make new release "_^
